article_title: Allstate CEO: Insurance Merger Mania Is Big but Has Limits

article_metadata.description: Allstate CEO Tom Wilson doesn't think the property-casualty industry will see the same M&A deals as in the health insurance sector.
article_metadata.author: Gregg Greenberg
